[onError?](./ts-utils.validators.irecordofvalidatoroptions.onerror.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

'fail' \| 'ignore'


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ If `onError` is `'fail'` (default), then the entire validation fails if any key or element cannot be validated. If `onError` is `'ignore'`<!-- -->, failing elements are silently ignored.
